import { Container, Nav, Navbar as NavbarBs, Dropdown, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import {FaShoppingCart} from 'react-icons/fa' import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuthContext } from "../hooks/useAuthContext"; export const Navbar = () => { const {user} = useAuthContext(); //to see user in context return (
Home Products About {user && ( Account )} {!user && ( Login ) } {/* shopping cart button */}
{0} Cart is Empty!
{/* */}
); };
